_sText: This is my X-Wing prefab. You can find a 100% working example of the ship in ze_space_station but it has some minor differences. This one has the blue noob control panel removed and is a little stronger. It only fits one passenger well. Others can fall out easily. To keep from falling out just hold down crouch while in the X-Wing. The little box in the prefab is needed for the lasers to work. Just put it somewhere in the map where no1 will see it. Here's a video of it in game: *EDIT* Figured I'd put a little here about the controls... Middle black rectangle button closes the windshield. Bottom middle square with red dot turns on the power. This will set the X-Wing to hover. Big Red and Blue button will activate controls. Bottom left, once you have control, will open the S-Foils and let you fire. Left mouse is move forwards, right is fire lasers. Bottom right button will freeze the ship in mid-air. The top three buttons just increase the neutral lift so if you have a passenger it will accommodate their weight. They aren't used for anything else. Just leave them off if you're the only pilot. Note: To use the X-Wing you must have on the server: sv_turbophysics 0 Most servers default to 0 but Zombie Mod has it at 1. Put a point_servercommand in the map that sets sv_turbophysics 0 if your map will be played on a zombie server.
